abstract: British Library rejects request to host huge collection of Taliban-related documents painstakingly collected and transcribed into English by Taliban Sources Project; says acceptance may violate Britain’s anti-terrorism laws, even though project organizers say material would be of no use to potential terrorists.
lead_paragraph: A project to digitize Taliban documents was shelved by the British Library after the institution determined that publishing the collection could breach antiterrorism laws.

headline.main: Antiterrorism Laws Prompt British Library to Distance Itself From Taliban Project
headline.print_headline: Fearing Legal Problems, British Library Rejects Taliban Project

snippet: A project to digitize Taliban documents was shelved by the British Library after the institution determined that publishing the collection could breach antiterrorism laws.
